# Build output
bin/
obj/

# User-specific files
*.user
*.suo
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

# Visual Studio Code
.vscode/

# Visual Studio specific files
.vs/
*.vssscc
*.vssscc
*.vsidx

# Packages
packages/
*.nupkg
*.snupkg

# Logs and generated files
*.log
*.tlog
*.cache

# Publish output
publish/
app.publish/

# Dependencies
project.lock.json
project.assets.json

# Resharper
*.DotSettings.user

# Rider
.idea/

# Windows Forms auto-generated files
*.Designer.cs
*.resx
